Who I Am

My name is Zane. I'm a 24 year old product designer recently relocated to San Francisco.

Currently user experience designer for Days for Girls and Mother 4. Previously digital strategist with Red Letter Communications. Graduated in 2014 with a BS in public relations.

HCI

  • User Research & Testing
  • Information Architecture
  • Visual Design
  • Prototyping
  • Wireframing

If I'm not building something, I'm camping with my dog, volunteering with Big Brothers, Big Sisters and sending postcards back home. You can check out the beers and books I love—and recommend me more.

Let's grab a beer. have tea. get lunch.
